## System.stop() method

Stops all system components in reverse dependency order. If any component's `stop()` method returns false, a warning message will be logged, but unlike [System.start()](./system.system.start.md)<!-- -->, the shutdown process of other components will not be stopped.

Any errors thrown during child component shutdown will not be intercepted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stop(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<boolean>`
